snippet: A man who has ties to President Michel Martelly was accused in an indictment on charges of masterminding a host of violent crimes.
abstract: Obama administration expresses concern over Haitian court's refusal to prosecute suspected gang leaders Woodly Etheart, who has ties to Pres Michel Martelly, and Renel Nelfort.
lead_paragraph: A man who has ties to President Michel Martelly was accused in an indictment on charges of masterminding a host of violent crimes.

headline.main: U.S. Expresses Concern About Dismissal of Haiti Kidnapping Case
headline.print_headline: U.S. Expresses Concern About Dismissal of Haiti Kidnapping Case
